posts.post_content:
Conditions: All prices include S&H.  USPS First Class with tracking number.  Buyer pays PayPal fees.

For sale I have 6 different PSA graded cards:  

1. Piedmont - Lefty Leifield (Pitching) - PSA 2 - SOLD!
2. Sweet Cap - Jack Hannifan - PSA 3 - SOLD!
3. Piedmont - Lee Tannehill (Chi., L. Tannehill) - PSA 5 - SOLD! 
4. Sweet Cap - Jack Hayden (Portrait) - PSA 2 - SOLD!
5. Sweet Cap - Hooks Wiltse (Port. No Cap) - PSA 2 - SOLD!
6. Piedmont - Harry Arndt - PSA 2 - SOLD!

See photographs:

[IMG]http://s11.postimage.org/be4gh2zcj/PSA_Lot_0218.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://s11.postimage.org/lqqr35svn/PSA_Lot_0218_2.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://s17.postimage.org/4g7ib3w27/PSA_Lot_0218_4.jpg[/IMG]
Pm sent on Leifield, Hannafin and Heyden

Price Reduction on the last two:

Piedmont - Lee Tannehill (Chi., L. Tannehill) - PSA 5 - $95 
Sweet Cap - Hooks Wiltse (Port. No Cap) - PSA 2 - $30

Hi Manny,
E-mail sent re Tannehill PSA 5.
Thanks,
--S

Manny,
I will take Tannehill if still available.  Please send me a PM or email.
Thanks.
Scot
Wow, card came quick. Well done Manny!
